wikipedia_page.main: Stephen John Bridges LVO (born 19 June 1960) was a British diplomat who served as the British Ambassador to Cambodia between 2000 and 2005, Acting and Deputy High Commissioner to Bangladesh between 2005 and 2007 and as HM Consul-General Chicago between 2013 and 2017.

response: * Stephen Bridges LVO, Ambassador to Cambodia from 2000 to 2005'BRIDGES, Stephen John', Who's Who 2011, A & C Black, 2011; online edn, Oxford University Press, December 2010 (accessed 24 September 2011).
